Genus Ophrysia
Himalayan quail, Ophrysia superciliosa (critically endangered/extinct)
Quails in cookery: Quail that have fed on hemlock (e.g., during migration) may induce acute renal failure due to accumulation of toxic substances from the hemlock in the meat; this problem is referred to as "coturnism".
